textBeforeTable: Must be one of the following constant values. When set to alignMargins, causes alignment to take place between the outer boundary of a view, as defined by its margins. When set to alignBounds, causes alignment to take place between the edges of the view. The default is alignMargins. See setAlignmentMode(int). android:alignmentMode XML Attributes AccessibilityEvent.
